attributes.action: lower speed limits on motorways and high speed roads to save the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's been done in the past when there was a fuel shortage and is a very cost effective way of lowering co2 emissions and saving fuel usage, it will also reduce our imports of petrol/diesel, save drivers money, encourage long distance travelers to use trains, reduce the severity of crashes saving NHS costs, reduce wear on vehicles and stress in drivers; the only looser will be the government with less fuel duty. 
You know it makes sense, it's either doing it this way or letting the government price normal drivers off the roads.
